text: Ottakarathevar Panneerselvam, popularly known as OPS (born 14 January 1951) is an Indian politician who was the 6th Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu from 2016 to 2017 and previously 2001 to 2002 and 2014 to 2015. Category:Living people Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:1951 births Category:All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam politicians
title: O. Panneerselvam
